trans-unit.source: How does Azure AD work?
trans-unit.target: How does Azure AD work?

trans-unit.source: Azure AD creates an identity landscape that is yours in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD creates an identity landscape that is yours in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: It can be connected to your on-premises identity system or used independently.
trans-unit.target: It can be connected to your on-premises identity system or used independently.

trans-unit.source: How does Azure Active Directory work?
trans-unit.target: How does Azure Active Directory work?

trans-unit.source: Other articles on this topic
trans-unit.target: Other articles on this topic

trans-unit.source: [What is Azure AD?](active-directory-whatis.md)
trans-unit.target: [What is Azure AD?](active-directory-whatis.md)

trans-unit.source: [How does it work?](active-directory-works.md)
trans-unit.target: [How does it work?](active-directory-works.md)

trans-unit.source: [Get started](active-directory-get-started.md)
trans-unit.target: [Get started](active-directory-get-started.md)

trans-unit.source: [Next steps](active-directory-next-steps.md)
trans-unit.target: [Next steps](active-directory-next-steps.md)

trans-unit.source: [Learn more](active-directory-learn-map.md)
trans-unit.target: [Learn more](active-directory-learn-map.md)

trans-unit.source: Azure AD creates an identity landscape that is yours in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD creates an identity landscape that is yours in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: It can be connected to your on-premises identity system or used independently.
trans-unit.target: It can be connected to your on-premises identity system or used independently.

trans-unit.source: You can think of an account in Azure AD as your driver's license for the cloud: it's your unique ID for accessing services online.
trans-unit.target: You can think of an account in Azure AD as your driver's license for the cloud: it's your unique ID for accessing services online.

trans-unit.source: In that sense, Azure AD works like your own private registrar in the cloud for those driver's licenses.
trans-unit.target: In that sense, Azure AD works like your own private registrar in the cloud for those driver's licenses.

trans-unit.source: It enables identities to be used anywhere in the cloud, and improves mobility for users who access resources on-premises.
trans-unit.target: It enables identities to be used anywhere in the cloud, and improves mobility for users who access resources on-premises.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] To use Azure Active Directory, you need an Azure account.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] To use Azure Active Directory, you need an Azure account.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have an account, you can [sign up for a free Azure account](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).
trans-unit.target: If you don't have an account, you can [sign up for a free Azure account](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).

trans-unit.source: How does Azure AD support Office 365, Microsoft Intune, and other Azure services?
trans-unit.target: How does Azure AD support Office 365, Microsoft Intune, and other Azure services?

trans-unit.source: The Azure portal, Office 365 Admin Center, Microsoft Intune account portal, and the cmdlets from the Azure AD PowerShell module all read from and write to a single shared instance of Azure AD that is associated with your directory.
trans-unit.target: The Azure portal, Office 365 Admin Center, Microsoft Intune account portal, and the cmdlets from the Azure AD PowerShell module all read from and write to a single shared instance of Azure AD that is associated with your directory.

trans-unit.source: Portals (or cmdlets) act as a front-end interface that pulls in or changes your directory information.
trans-unit.target: Portals (or cmdlets) act as a front-end interface that pulls in or changes your directory information.

trans-unit.source: [Learn more about support for other services](active-directory-administer.md#what-is-an-azure-ad-tenant)
trans-unit.target: [Learn more about support for other services](active-directory-administer.md#what-is-an-azure-ad-tenant)

trans-unit.source: How does Azure AD support 3rd party applications?
trans-unit.target: How does Azure AD support 3rd party applications?

trans-unit.source: Azure AD simplifies authentication for developers by providing identity as a service, along with open source libraries for different platforms to help you start coding quickly.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD simplifies authentication for developers by providing identity as a service, along with open source libraries for different platforms to help you start coding quickly.

trans-unit.source: [Learn more about authentication scenarios for Azure AD](active-directory-authentication-scenarios.md).
trans-unit.target: [Learn more about authentication scenarios for Azure AD](active-directory-authentication-scenarios.md).

trans-unit.source: How does Azure AD extend my on-premises directory?
trans-unit.target: How does Azure AD extend my on-premises directory?

trans-unit.source: Azure AD supports several of the most widely used authentication and authorization protocols.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD supports several of the most widely used authentication and authorization protocols.

trans-unit.source: [Learn more about Azure Active Directory authentication protocols](active-directory-authentication-scenarios.md).
trans-unit.target: [Learn more about Azure Active Directory authentication protocols](active-directory-authentication-scenarios.md).
